gameDetails.name: Legends of Andor: The Mermaid Iria
gameDetails.description:
Nixe Irja (Mermaid Irja) is the first promo for Legends of Andor: Journey north.

She fell in love with one of the heroes and waits for him every dawn. Position Irja with the roll of a red die. Determine a hero by uncovering a coat of arms. 
If this hero is on Irja's field or next to it at dawn he gets with a die roll of 1,2 / 3,4 / 5,6 a present: 2 gold / 1 strength / 1 fame respectively. And Irja moves to the rolled field.
If he is not the heroes lose 1 fame. Determine also a new hero by uncovering a coat of arms (may be the same). Also position Irja via die roll anew.
